body.name: ZIKEE Lumbar Support Pillow for Office Chair, Patented Ergonomic Memory Foam Back Pillow with Convex Design for Lower Back Pain Relief, Back Cushion with Dual Straps, Ice Silk & Breathable Fabrics
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 15 mins
features: Innovative Convex Design for Targeted Lumbar Support: This back support cushion adopts quality memory foam with an innovative extra-density insert for targeted and enhanced lumbar support. The lumbar pillow can provide lower back pain relief and improve your sitting posture. Crafted for your daily sitting comfort.

Ergonomic Multi-region for Contoured Comfort: The chair back cushion is designed with an ergonomic shape for back multi-region support. The lumbar cushion can help relieve pressure and pain on the shoulder blade, spine, and tailbone caused by long sitting.

Breathable & Fresh on Back All Day: The back pillows for sitting equipped with 2 quality fabrics can offer long-lasting breathable comfort. The central ice silky fabric matches breathable fabric keeping your back cool and refreshing all day.

Dual Adjustable Fixing Straps for Universal Fit: The car back support pillow comes with dual adjustable fixing straps and an anti-slip bottom to secure it to the desired support position without constant adjustments. The back cushion for office chair is suitable for various chairs, providing you with comfortable seating wherever you go. (Size: 15" x 12.5" x 4.1" ）

Premium Customer Service: ZIKEE provides you with a hassle-free shopping experience. We address any questions or concerns for you anytime. If the chair back support cushion has quality problems in 24 months, we promise you a hassle-free return. Get assured to start your comfortable sitting experience.

reviews.reviewerName: Joy it was a gift for someone, I tried it and loved it, very comfortable. He says he likes it very much!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort for your back
reviews.reviewText: He uses it in his portable chair he uses to walk with. The straps on the back help a lot to keep it in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FINALLY! One that SUPPORTS!!
reviews.reviewText: You might say we are somewhat experts on lower back support. Nobody here is an orthopedic surgeon or anything, but there are lower back situations which have necessitated a plethora of lumbar support cushions over the years. Our general experience has been that lumbar support cushions tend to fall a little short in the area of…well…lumbar support….Then arrives the ZIKEE Lumbar Support Pillow!! If there were a way to insert angelic choirs with Xenon light beams from on high bathing this product in its Heavenly light, I would put that in. I guess you’ll just have to visualize it. What makes this one so different? This has a very dense memory foam “core” that provides added support in the critical lumbar zone. It seems a fundamental idea, but only this product has that feature of the many we have tried over time.On the flip side, it is possible this core feature could develop a “hot spot” over a lengthy spell - say a long drive or a marathon ZOOM meeting. This would have been helped with a little denser foam surrounding the core - but that is a relatively small thing in my humble opinion. We will accept that to get the added support where it really counts every time.The good: Obviously the lumbar support is the star of this show. In the supporting roles however are very high-quality construction. Sturdy mounting straps (for desk chair). You wouldn’t sling your ruck sack to them or anything but they are of a heavier gauge than most products like this would have.Opportunities to improve: A little denser foam surrounding the core would morph this into an utterly perfect product.Bottom line: About a 9.9 out of a perfect 10 - would get a gold medal in most Olympics. A BARGAIN at the price point it comes in at.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The ZIKEE Lumbar Support Pillow is back saving!The high density memory foam on the inside is really soft and contours to your back providing ample support and coverage. You don't sink into it, it just hold you. I've haven't felt anything this good from the various other back support pillows I've tried. This is honestly the best one I've ever tried!The outside material is breathable on the front and more solid on the back with little dots to prevent slipping. Has two adjustable straps that you can evenly secure to most chairs. I use a folding plastic steel tube frame chair that's open in the middle at my computer desk and I was able to strap it to the top half and it stays. This has instantly made my chair more comfortable!This pillow really feels good. I'm able to sit up more comfortable and improve my posture when eating and working at my desk for long periods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cushion has distinctively more support in the middle, which I like, but the shape of the cushion is a bit asymmetrical,, the right half has a different curve & shape than the left half. It's kinda annoying, but it's not with the trouble of returning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good lumbar support even in my ancient office chair!
reviews.reviewText: This is the 3rd lumbar support cushion I've gotten in the past few months, one more and I I will no longer have a need to move one to the car when I leave home for a long day out and about. this one works every bit as good as the slightly more expensive 'brand name' one I got initially...and FAR better than the second one, which neither of us like very much. IF I could give it 4.5 stars I would.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Lower Back Pillow
reviews.reviewText: This item arrived vacuum-sealed and as soon as I removed it from that plastic seal it basically instantly inflated to full form. It didn't require any extra time to reform and set up so I was able to immediately see and get an impression of how it would work.This lower back pillow is a mix of micro-fiber and memory foam. There;'s no weird smell or texture. It feels both soft and yet with a good amount of firmness. When you push down on it with your hand you feel a good amount of sturdiness with a soft 'give'.What I like about this lumbar pillow is that it gives you so many options of locations to use it. You can place it against a hard-back wooden chair, a soft computer chair, a couch, and a car seat. I appreciate that the back of the pillow comes with straps so if you need to you can affix it to any piece of furniture so that it fits perfectly for your body regardless of height.The price for this pillow is excellent and the comfort it provides is pretty satisfying. I'd say this is a good option for anyone suffering from lower back pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Lumbar Support for Lower back pain relief
reviews.reviewText: As a professional who spends long hours at my office desk, the Lumbar Support Pillow for Office Chair proven to be an indispensable addition to my workspace. I use to feel like my lower back was flamed and definitely tense at the end of each day. The soft comfortable foam that support the lower back is definitely a huge relief.Whether attached to my office chair, car seat, or even used on other seating surfaces, this lumbar support pillow seamlessly integrates into various environments, making it a versatile solution for my ergonomic needs.The pillow's cover is made from a breathable material that enhances comfort during prolonged use. It ensures proper ventilation, preventing overheating and allowing me to stay focused on my tasks without distractions.The pillow exhibits durability in both its construction and materials, and the cover is conveniently removable and machine-washable. This makes maintenance a breeze, adding to the overall convenience of the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This support actually works!
reviews.reviewText: I don't just hand out five star reviews, but this actually earned it. It has truly worked wonders for my back. I have used this Lumbar support in a chair I use for work for several weeks now. It has held up remarkably well. It is still very firm, and there is no sag whatsoever in the material. In short, it's well built.If you're like me and spend a lot of time working at a desk, this could be very helpful for you. It has certainly worked for me. I will happily rate this at five stars!!!
